short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get definition and synonyms of a word instantly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the definition/synonym of any word in a webpage.

With synohelper Select any word on a webpage and see its definition or its synonym by using the context-menu option.
The definition can also be viewed in the extension popup page.

The best thing about Synohelper is that you can use it on pdf files too.
